product_name: Ortlieb Sport Packer Plus Bike Panniers - Pair
long_description: The Sport Packer Plus panniers are the perfect size for your daily commute, or to strap on to children's bikes. Made to mount on low-rider front racks or rear racks, panniers feature snug-fitting lids that allow for higher load capacity. Features an inner zippered mesh pocket. Robust lid straps hold lid down tight; cinch-down gasket under the lid protects contents from dust and snow. Abrasion-resistant recesses on the rear side of the panniers allow the use of additional compression straps, sold separately. QL2 suspension system holds bags secure and is easy to load and unload; no tools necessary. Features 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflectors to increase your visibility in poor light.
short_description: The Sport Packer Plus panniers are the perfect size for your daily commute, or to strap on to children's bikes.
